Are you ready to reach yours? Come join us.” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id=”sidebar-5b6cfa681b024″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575621619959{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”848″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Nice to Meet You” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

There are many IT companies in US, but none quite like NanoSoft. We’ve been around for over 30 years but you wouldn’t guess it from the energy in the place. Along the way, we have picked up plenty of awards, we currently rank 3rd in the Great Place to Work’s Best Workplaces and have been a Deloitte Best Managed Company for over 10 years.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1575621626392{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”302″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575621633073{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Current Openings” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Feel fulfilled. Have fun. Help us to shape the future.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Role Location Type
Engineer: Observability Applications
New York Full Time Apply Now
Cloud Ops Administrator
 New York Full Time Apply Now
Platform Support Specialist
New York Full Time Apply Now

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

We are always on the lookout for talented folk to join our team. Follow us on LinkedIn!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575621642375{padding-top: 80px !important;}” el_class=”gradient fix-overflow”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Benefits” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Here are just some of the perks you’ll get as a member of NanoSoft

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

  • Health Care

    No-premium health, dental, and vision benefits, 401K, FSA

  • Flexibility

    Flexible work hours, unlimited vacation, and paid parental leave

  • Meals

    Healthy catered lunches, dinners, and drinks on site

  • Fun

    Board games, team outings, company parties, and more

  • Lifestyle

    Monthly wellness stipend (gym, work-out gear, etc.)

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
